message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the item.
Thanks for your interest in the product, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $125.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am comfortable offering $110 for the product.

I'm glad we're still in talks, Bob! I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'll offer it to you for $130. This is my best price, and I think it's a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Considering your latest offer, I would like to counter with a price of $120 for the product.

I'm not ready to give up yet, Bob! I think we can find a sweet spot. I'm willing to meet you at $125, but that's as low as I can go. This is my final offer, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.
Considering your last offer, I would like to propose a price of $122 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise between our positions.
I'm not going to give up on this deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $123, but that's as close to $125 as I can get. This is my last offer, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.
